InstructionData.Title: GFG-300
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# GFG-300 # Gas Fuel Generator Controller alias GFG d0 #alias GasSensor d1 #alias Unused1 d2 #alias VentCool d3 alias Battery d1 #alias Unused2 d5
define PRESINSIDE 101 define PRESOUTSIDE 101 define PRESPIPE 40000 define MINCHARGE 0.1 define MAXTEMPC 23.3333
alias charge r0 alias activate r1 alias maxtemp r2 alias curtemp r3
init: #move maxtemp 273.15 #add maxtemp maxtemp MAXTEMPC #s VentRelief Mode 1 #s VentRelief PressureExternal 102.325 #s VentRelief PressureInternal PRESPIPE #s VentRelief On 1
#s VentCool Mode 1 #s VentCool PressureExternal 0 #s VentCool PressureInternal 110 #s VentCool On 0
start: l charge Battery Ratio sle activate charge MINCHARGE # charge < MINCHARGE s GFG On activate
#l curtemp GasSensor Temperature #sgt activate curtemp maxtemp # curtemp > maxtemp #s db Setting activate #s VentCool On activate
yield j start
